title: Steve Spurrier To Retire
text:
By Sports Department - Tim Hill 
Story Created: Oct 12, 2015 at 9:43   13, 2015 at 5:41 AM EDT COLUMBIA, S.C. (WOLO) -- Steve Spurrier is retiring according to team sources and multiple reports.The news was first reported Monday night by SI.com.The Ball Coach informed the team Monday night. According to a team source, Spurrier was emotional when he made the announcement that shocked players. Spurrier told the team this season has been very stressful. Spurrier is expected to publicly announced the news at his normal weekly press conference Tuesday at noon.Gamecocks quarterback Connor Mitch tweeted Monday night, "Man it's been a crazy day."
